title: Google repair center sent my phone back to me with no sim card tray and scratched screen!
content:
I sent my Pixel 4XL into the Google Repair Center for a warranty issue. As expected, I received the phone back within a week. I expected the phone to be repaired. 

Instead, the phone now has a deep scratch in the display AND is missing the sim card tray. Without the tray, it is unusable. 

I've been dealing with the support team for 4 days now. They keep telling me "it is escalated," but they will not give me any eta or idea of when I will get my phone fixed. I have my phone with me still. 

GOOGLE NEEDS TO FIX THIS. I NEED A WORKING PHONE. It was GOOGLE'S repair center that messed up. This needs to be fixed.
